title: Smallest sample size to guarantee margin of error

content.question: A 95 percent confidence interval of the form p̂ ± E will be used to obtain an estimate for an unknown population proportion p. If p̂ is the sample proportion and E is the margin of error, which of the following is the smallest sample size that will guarantee a margin of error of at most 0.08?

topic.text: 6.2: Constructing a Confidence Interval for a Population Proportion

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Construct a confidence interval, provided conditions for inference are met.
